mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.sido_name, c.sido_code, c.gugun_name, c.gugun_code, c.detail_address, c.latitude, c.longitude, c.image_url, c.introduction, c.telephone, c.homepage_url, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review r WHERE r.camping_id = id) AS review_cnt FROM camping c WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM camping c JOIN attractions a ON a.no = #{attractionId} WHERE a.area_code = c.sido_code AND a.si_gun_gu_code = c.gugun_code AND image_url IS NOT NULL AND image_url != ''
